name: Underhand Lat Pull Down
how_to_perform:
1. Sit at a lat pull down machine with your knees securely under the knee pad and your back flat against the backrest.

2. Grasp the bar with both hands using an underhand grip, which means your palms will be facing towards you.

3. Engage your core by pulling your belly button towards your spine to maintain good posture and stability throughout the exercise.

4. Pull the bar down toward your chest, keeping your elbows close to your body as you do so. Focus on squeezing your lats at the top of the movement.

5. Slowly return the bar to its starting position, maintaining control throughout the entire range of motion.

6. Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.
short_summary: The underhand lat pull down is an exercise that targets the latissimus dorsi muscles in your back, working them from a seated position using a lat pull down machine.
